verses.text:
Spend and be spent for Jesus,
Give all as he has done;
Let not a single talent
His in the earth be gone.

Spend and be spent for Jesus,
Work for the Master's cause;
Saving the lost and dying,
Obeying all his laws.

Spend and be spent for Jesus,
Let all thy powers be free;
Let not the world's allurements
Win thee away from me.

Spend and be spent for Jesus,
So when thy work is done,
Joyful the blessed welcome:
'Well done, my faithful one!'

chorus.text:
Spend and be spent for Jesus,
Spend and be spent for Jesus,
Spend and be spent for Jesus,
Give all as he has done.
